attributes.title: All About Vertical Timezones - Your Path To Kailasa || 29 Jan 2021
attributes.description:
29 JANUARY 2021

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*LISTEN INTENSELY, SINCERELY.

*TODAY’S MESSAGE IS ALL ABOUT THE VERTICAL TIMEZONES, YOUR DIRECT PATH TO KAILASA.

*COMING TO RIGHT, POWERFUL CONCLUSIONS ABOUT THE VERTICAL TIME ZONES GIVES YOU DIRECT ACCESS TO KAILASA. IT CAN MAKE YOU MANIFEST THE POWERS OF PARAMASHIVA IMMEDIATELY.

*ALL OF YOU HAVE YOUR PRESENCE IN ALL 14 TIMEZONES: THE HIGHER TIME ZONES - FROM BHUR, BHUVA, SUVA, TAPA, SATYA UPTO KAILASA AND ALL THE LOWER LEVEL: ATALA, VITALA, SUTALA, MAHATALA, TALATALA, PATALA.

*PRINCIPLE OF VERTICAL TIME ZONES: THEY ARE THE HIGHER AND LOWER LOKAS WHERE NOT JUST THE QUANTITY, BUT THE VERY QUALITY OF TIME IS DIFFERENT; THE DEFINITION OF TIME IS DIFFERENT. 

*IF YOU LISTEN CAREFULLY, YOU CAN GET THE POWERFUL CONCLUSIONS I AM CONVEYING.

*ALL OF YOU HAVE YOUR PRESENCE IN ALL 14 LOKAS: FOR EXAMPLE, 
IN NAGA LOKA, THERE IS A BEING WITH YOUR FACE AND SNAKE BODY. 
IN TAPOLOKA, THERE IS A RISHI WITH YOUR FACE AND THE BODY OF THE RISHI - TAPASVI. 
IN SWARGA LOKA, THERE IS ALREADY A GOD WITH YOUR FACE AND THE GOD BODY. 

*ONE MORE EXAMPLE: IN ALL 14 LOKAS, YOU HAVE YOUR BANK ACCOUNT OPENED. IF YOU ARE INTENSE IN YOUR TAPAS, IN  YOUR TAPOLOKA ACCOUNT, YOU HAVE MILLION DOLLARS. IF YOU ARE SHALLOW WITH YOUR DEMONIC ATTITUDE, YOUR PERSONALITY IN TAPO LOKA HAS PRACTICALLY ZERO MONEY.

*YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR PRESENCE IN ALL 14 LOKAS. THE HUMAN FRAME IS SUCH A HIGHLY EVOLVED HARDWARE, FRAMEWORK. YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS TO BE MATURE ENOUGH TO HANDLE THE HUMAN HARDWARE.

*IN PATALA, WHERE THE DEMONS EXIST, THERE IS A RAKSHASA WITH YOUR FACE AND DEMON BODY. 

*IN TAPO LOKA, YOUR IDENTITY EXISTS. THERE IS A PERSON WITH YOUR FACE AND A GREAT RISHI BODY. THE MORE TAPAS YOU DO, THE MORE YOUR TAPO LOKA IDENTITY IS EMPOWERED. THE LESS DEMONIC BODY ACTIVITY YOU DO, THE DEMONIC BODY IN PATALA LOKA SLOWLY DISSOLVES AND LOSES ITS POWER OVER YOU AND YOU ARE LIBERATED. 

*IT IS YOUR DECISION! YOU HAVE CONSCIOUS FREEDOM TO EMPOWER WHICH LOKA’S IDENTITY YOU WANT TO MANIFEST IN YOUR EVERYDAY LIFE. 

*THE TRUTHS I AM REVEALING IS DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA. HE REVEALED IN VEDAS AND AGAMAS IN SANSKRIT. NOW, HE IS REVEALING IN ENGLISH. 

*THE PANINIAN, PHONETIC AND LINGUISTIC GRAMMATICAL METHODOLOGY PARAMASHIVA USED IN VEDA AND AGAMAS, NOW, HE IS USING THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE AND GRAMMAR TO EXPRESS THOSE TRUTHS. 

*I AM NOT SAYING YOU HAVE ACCESS TO ALL 14 LOKAS. I AM SAYING YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR IDENTITY ESTABLISHED IN ALL 14 LOKAS. 

*IF YOUR STOMACH IS BURNING, IF ARE STILL CAPABLE OF FEELING THE FIRE OF HUNGER, YOUR IDENTITY IS ALREADY ESTABLISHED IN SWARGA LOKA. YOUR CAPACITY TO FEEL HUNGER AND YOUR IDENTITY IN SWARGA LOKA IS ONE AND THE SAME.

*IF YOU ARE ABLE TO FEEL HUNGER, BE CLEAR, THIS IS A GOOD NEWS FOR YOU. YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR PRESENCE IN SWARGA LOKA. IT MAYBE WEAK, THAT IS WHY YOU ARE NOT EXPERIENCING IT EVERYDAY, BUT YOU HAVE YOUR PRESENCE.

*ALL THE HIGHER VERTICAL TIMEZONES UPTO KAILASA AND ALL THE LOWER TIMEZONES UPTO PATALA, IN ALL 14 LOKAS, YOUR IDENTITY IS ALREADY ALIVE BECAUSE YOU ARE ALREADY INITIATED. 

*IF YOU ARE AN INITIATE, NOT ONLY 14 LOKAS BUT BEYOND THAT IN THE 15TH SPACE - KAILASA - ALSO, YOUR EXISTENCE IS ASSURED. THE DOORS OF KAILASA ARE OPEN FOR YOU. 

*IT IS LIKE A LADDER. ANYTIME YOU CAN GO TO ANY ONE OF YOUR IDENTITIES, OPEN YOUR NEW LIFE / EXISTENCE / POSSIBILITY.

*YOUR EXISTENCE IS ALIVE, SPONTANEOUS, SIMULTANEOUS IN ALL 14 LOKAS. 

*YOU HAVE THE FREEDOM TO STRENGTHEN OR WEAKEN ANY OF THESE 14 IDENTITIES.

*YOU CAN BE A DEMON IF YOU CONTINUOUSLY COME TO POWERFUL CONCLUSIONS THAT DEMONIC QUALITIES ARE BEST TO SUCCEED IN THIS WORLD AND START ACTING ON THIS CONCLUSION. 

*THEN, YOU ARE STRENGTHENING YOUR DEMONIC IDENTITY. YOU START PLANNING YOUR FUTURE IN PATALA - ASURA LOKA.

*IF YOU COME TO THE CONCLUSION: ‘A VERY DHARMIC WAY OF LIVING…’WIN-WIN’ WILL ALWAYS BE THE BEST STRATEGY FOR SUCCESS IN LIFE,’ WHERE YOU FEEL ‘I SHOULD ALWAYS WIN, HE SHOULD ALWAYS WIN, THAT IS THE BEST STRATEGY FOR SUCCESS IN LIFE' AND YOU START EXECUTING THOSE CONCLUSIONS, THEN YOUR PERSONALITY IN SWARGA LOKA WILL GET STRENGTHENED AND YOU START MANIFESTING YOUR FUTURE IN SWARGA LOKA.





Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
